title: Top Countries by Fiscal Activity
finding: Rwanda has the highest total fiscal activity (42,045,274,314), followed by Nigeria (8,251,808,799)
impact: High - Identifies key fiscal players requiring focused policy attention

title: Most Tracked Fiscal Indicators
finding: Inflation Rate  is the most frequently tracked indicator (2868 records)
impact: Medium - Shows priority areas for fiscal monitoring

title: Long-Term Fiscal Trends
finding: Fiscal metrics show increasing trend: recent average (3,802,677) vs historical (422,623)
impact: High - Critical for understanding fiscal evolution over 65 years

title: Data Completeness
finding: 0.3% of records have missing Amount values, indicating data collection gaps
impact: Medium - Affects reliability of analysis, requires data quality initiatives

title: Fiscal Indicator Coverage
finding: South Africa tracks the most diverse fiscal indicators (20 different indicators)
impact: Medium - Shows comprehensive fiscal monitoring capabilities
